parts.text: {"word":"abziehen","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"引く、差し引く (Mathematik)","english_definition":"to subtract (mathematics)","examples":[{"sentence":"Wenn man 3 von 10 abzieht, erhält man 7.","translation":"If you subtract 3 from 10, you get 7.","usage_notes":"主に数学的な文脈で使用されます。","collocations":["etwas von etwas abziehen"],"synonyms":["subtrahieren","vermindern"],"antonyms":["addieren","hinzufügen"]},{"sentence":"Ich muss noch die Steuern von meinem Gehalt abziehen.","translation":"I still have to deduct the taxes from my salary.","usage_notes":"給与や請求書などから税金や手数料などを差し引く場合に使われます。","collocations":["Steuern abziehen","Kosten abziehen"],"synonyms":["absetzen","verrechnen"],"antonyms":["hinzurechnen","aufrechnen"]}],"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"剥がす、取り外す","english_definition":"to peel off, to remove","examples":[{"sentence":"Er zog das Etikett von der Flasche ab.","translation":"He peeled the label off the bottle.","usage_notes":"物理的に何かを剥がす、取り外す動作を表します。","collocations":["ein Etikett abziehen","eine Folie abziehen"],"synonyms":["entfernen","ablösen"],"antonyms":["aufkleben","anbringen"]},{"sentence":"Zieh die Schuhe ab, bevor du reinkommst.","translation":"Take off your shoes before you come in.","usage_notes":"衣服や靴などを脱ぐ場合に使われます。","collocations":["Schuhe abziehen","Handschuhe abziehen"],"synonyms":["ausziehen","entkleiden"],"antonyms":["anziehen","bekleiden"]}],"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"立ち去る、出発する","english_definition":"to leave, to depart","examples":[{"sentence":"Die Truppen zogen ab.","translation":"The troops withdrew.","usage_notes":"軍隊や集団が撤退、出発する際に使われます。","collocations":["die Truppen ziehen ab","die Gäste ziehen ab"],"synonyms":["weggehen","abreisen"],"antonyms":["ankommen","eintreffen"]}],"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","reflexive":"sich abziehen","definition":"(嵐などが)過ぎ去る、(痛みが)和らぐ","english_definition":"(of a storm, pain etc.) to subside, to pass","examples":[{"sentence":"Der Schmerz zog langsam ab.","translation":"The pain slowly subsided.","usage_notes":"痛みや不快感が徐々に軽減する場合に使われます。","collocations":["der Schmerz zieht ab","das Unwetter zieht ab"],"synonyms":["nachlassen","verschwinden"],"antonyms":["zunehmen","verstärken"]}],"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"だまし取る、詐取する","english_definition":"to swindle, to cheat","examples":[{"sentence":"Er hat sie um ihr ganzes Geld abgezogen.","translation":"He swindled her out of all her money.","usage_notes":"金銭などを不正に奪う行為を指します。","collocations":["jemanden um Geld abziehen"],"synonyms":["betrügen","ausnehmen"],"antonyms":["unterstützen","helfen"]}],"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(コーヒーなどを)抽出する","english_definition":"to draw off (liquid), to tap","examples":[{"sentence":"Den Kaffee abziehen und servieren.","translation":"Draw off the coffee and serve it.","usage_notes":"液体を容器から取り出す、抽出する際に使われます。","collocations":["Kaffee abziehen","Wein abziehen"],"synonyms":["entnehmen","zapfen"],"antonyms":["einfüllen","hinzufügen"]}],"etymology":{"value":"古高ドイツ語の「abziohan」から派生。前置詞「ab-」（離れて）と動詞「ziohan」（引く、引っ張る）の組み合わせ。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˈapˌt͡siːən/","syllables":"ab-zie-hen"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["ziehe ab","ziehst ab","zieht ab","ziehen ab","zieht ab","ziehen ab"],"past_simple":["zog ab","zogst ab","zog ab","zogen ab","zogt ab","zogen ab"],"past_participle":"abgezogen","present_participle":"abziehend"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「abziehen」は非常に多義的な動詞であり、文脈によって意味が大きく異なります。数学的な引き算から、物理的な剥離、立ち去る、詐欺、液体の抽出まで、幅広い意味を持ちます。再帰動詞「sich abziehen」として使われる場合、嵐や痛みが和らぐことを意味します。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Ich habe das Geld von dem Konto abziehen.","correct":"Ich habe das Geld von dem Konto abgezogen.","note":"過去分詞形は「abgezogen」です。"},{"incorrect":"Er zieht die Jacke an.","correct":"Er zieht die Jacke aus.","note":"「脱ぐ」という意味では「ausziehen」または「abziehen」を使います。「anziehen」は「着る」という意味です。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["Abzug (名詞: 控除、撤退、複写)","abziehbar (形容詞: 控除可能な)"],"compound_words":["abziehen lassen (控除できる)","sich abziehen (和らぐ、過ぎ去る)"],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B1","frequency_google_ngram":"比較的高頻度","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"「abziehen」は色々な意味がある動詞です。例えば、数学で何かを引くときや、シールを剥がすとき、服を脱ぐとき、軍隊が撤退するときなど、様々な状況で使われます。文脈によって意味が大きく変わるので、注意が必要です。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Du musst die Versandkosten vom Gesamtbetrag abziehen.","translation":"You have to deduct the shipping costs from the total amount.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"引く、差し引く"},{"sentence":"Sie zog das Pflaster schnell ab.","translation":"She quickly peeled off the plaster.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"剥がす、取り外す"},{"sentence":"Die Demonstranten zogen nach der Kundgebung ab.","translation":"The demonstrators left after the rally.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"立ち去る、出発する"},{"sentence":"Der Regen zog langsam ab.","translation":"The rain slowly subsided.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"(嵐などが)過ぎ去る"},{"sentence":"Er versuchte, den Touristen mit falschen Versprechungen Geld abzuziehen.","translation":"He tried to swindle the tourists with false promises.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"だまし取る、詐取する"}]}
